metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9287 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
servers/slapd/back-mdb/search.c in OpenLDAP through 2.4.44 is prone to adouble free vulnerability. A user with access to search the directory cancrash slapd by issuing a search including the Paged Results control with apage size of 0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9287` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.2
libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.2
slapd - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.2
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: openldap package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.42+dfsg-2ubuntu3.2').
